feed.title: Portage la Prairie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Portage la Prairie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:02 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Portage Southport Airport 12:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
Temperature: -8.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -10.3°C
Wind: ENE 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow early this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
